title: Scalable, Efficient & Easy to Use
text: The system is built with both HVAC technicians and the general population in mind

section.title: Large Amounts of Data
section.content: Ingest the large amounts of data generated by HVAC systems and store them efficiently

section.title: Machine Learning
section.content: Analyze Historical Data and build ML models based on that

section.title: Real-Time Data
section.content: Perform real-time/near real time analysis on the incoming streaming data

section.title: Easy to Use
section.content: Present the findings of the analysis in easy to understand visual aids
